# Rest API {transition="fade" .cover-section}

## Rest API {transition="fade"}

::: {.fragment .fade-left .justified}

GEO Knowledge Hub provides a Rest API to empower users and enable them to create solutions that make the use of the digital library easier for any case.

:::

::: {.fragment .fade-left .centered}
::: { .mt-120 }

This Rest API makes available all the functionality present in the interface. This way, we do not force users to use the interface.

:::
:::

## Rest API {transition="fade"}

::: {.fragment .fade-left .justified}

By using the Rest API, users can:

:::

::: {.borders .centered .spaced}
::: {.fragment .fade-left}
::: { .border .rounded .dashed .centered .w570 }
::: {.fs-30}
Create Knowledge Packages and Resources​
:::
:::
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-left}
::: { .border .rounded .dashed .centered .w570 }
::: {.fs-30}
Manage communities​
:::
:::
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-left}
::: { .border .rounded .dashed .centered .w570 }
::: {.fs-30}
Access vocabularies​
:::
:::
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-left}
::: { .border .rounded .dashed .centered .featured .w570 }
::: {.fs-30}
Many other operations​
:::
:::
:::
:::
